text: NBC was an Southeast Asian pay television owned by NBCUniversal International Networks. The channel launched on 1 January 1994 and replaced by National Geographic on 1 July 1998. The channel was later revived on 24 April 2011. The channel aired shows from the US NBC. The channel closed on 22 February 2023. Category:NBC Category:Television channels in Asia
title: NBC (Southeast Asian TV channel)
